CareRequestDrug.name: CareRequestDrug
CareRequestDrug.description: Represents the details of a requested drug including name, strength, frequency, and instructions for administration. One or more drug requests can be associated with a care request.

AssertionIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the coverage assertion.

AuthApprovalIdentifier.description: The unique identifier assigned to the drug on approval of the authorization request.

AuthorizationRefIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the authorization request associated with the requested drug.

CareRequestCaseId.description: Case related to the care request.

CareRequestId.description: Care request for the care request drug.

ClinicalDetermination.description: The clinical determination of the drug request.

ClinicalDeterminationNote.description: The notes related to the clinical determination.

ClinicalDeterminationReasonId.description: The reason for the clinical determination.

CodeType.description: ID code type for the drug.

DaysSupply.description: Number of days to supply the drug.

DecisionDate.description: The date and time when the decision was made for this drug request.

DispenserVerbalNotificationDateTime.description: Date and time when the pharmacy or pharmacy benefit manager was contacted verbally.

DispenserWrittenNotificationDateTime.description: Date and time when the pharmacy or pharmacy benefit manager was notified in writing or electronically.

DispensingPharmacyId.description: The pharmacy that dispenses the drug.

DrugAdministrationSetting.description: The setting where the drug is administered to the patient.

DrugCodeId.description: The code set that defines the requested drug.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MedicationCodeId.description: The code of the care request drug.

MedicationRefObjectId.description: The medication request or statement associated with the requested drug.

ModifiedCodeType.description: ID code type for the modified drug.

ModifiedDaysSupply.description: Number of days of supply for the modified drug.

ModifiedSig.description: Directions for use of the modified drug.

ModifiedTherapyDuration.description: Duration of therapy for the modified drug.

PrescriptionFillDate.description: Number of fills for the prescription.

PrescriptionFills.description: Number of fills for the prescription.

Priority.description: The priority of the authorization for the requested drug.

RequiredResponseCount.description: The number of responses required for the requested drug.

ResponseDateTime.description: The date and time when the response was sent for the drug request.

ServiceCategory.description: Name of the service type such as medical care, diagnostic radiology, pharmacy, or diagnostic laboratory.

ServiceCategoryCode.description: Alphanumeric code that uniquely identifies a service type.

ServiceInformationResponseId.description: The service information response associated with the drug request.

ServicingFacilityId.description: The facility where a patient receives service of the requested drug.

ServicingProviderId.description: The healthcare provider who provides the service of the requested drug.

Sig.description: Directions for use of the drug.

SourceSystem.description: System from which this request was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: ID of the system from which the request was sourced.

SourceSystemModified.description: Timestamp of the most recent update from the source system.

Status.description: The authorization status of the requested drug.

StatusCodeId.description: The code of the action taken by the reviewer for the requested drug.

StatusReason.description: The reason for assigning the authorization status to the requested drug.

SubmittedDateTime.description: The date and time when the drug request was submitted.

TherapyDuration.description: Duration of therapy for the drug.

TransactionNumber.description: The transaction number assigned to the drug request.
